title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1220.90 - Schedule of charges for use of Port Authority public vehicular parking area
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1220.90 - Schedule of charges for use of Port Authority public vehicular parking area

State Regulations

The following schedule of rates, which rates include
six percent New York City parking tax, is established for the public vehicular
parking area at the Port Authority bus terminal: Up to 1 hour -- $1.50

Up to 2 hours-- 2.50

Up to 4 hours-- 3.00

Up to 10 hours-- 3.50

Up to 11 hours-- 4.00

Up to 18 hours-- 4.50

Up to 24 hours-- 5.00

Over 24 hours-- $.50 for each hour or part
to a maximum of $5.00 for
each 24 hour period. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1220.90

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
